Personalised Children's Books:

Celebrating the Differences and Strengths in All Children

Create your book

About us

The Elephant’s Trunk is a children’s personalised book publishing company based in Ireland. We offer children’s books that are inclusive, diverse, educational, and fun.

Why choose the Elephant’s Trunk?

The Elephant’s Trunk was co-founded by an Intellectual Disability nurse and author who has 40 years of experience caring for people with disabilities.

Our Team Mission is to develop books and products that recognise the abilities and possibilities of all our children.

Our comprehensive character creator will transport the unique image and name of your child onto the page where they will become the hero in their own magical story world.

The name that blew away

It was Granny’s birthday and a child wanted to surprise her with a poster of their name, but a gust of wind blew the letters up, up, and away. Who will help to find the name? Will they find it in time for Granny’s party? Take your child on a magical journey to find their Name.

Name of Child and Starlight’s Christmas Adventure

On Christmas Eve Santa was in bed with the flu. “Who is going to save Christmas” cried Santa? Can Starlight and a very special child come to Santa’s aid and save Christmas? A delightful tale celebrating the magic of Christmas time. Along with Starlight, Santa’s favourite reindeer, what other cheeky animal sneaks a ride on Santa’s sleigh? read on and find out.

Three Naughty Bunnies

Three naughty bunnies went outside to play. “Do not go far, do not hop away”. But they didn’t listen, they were not good. And so they got lost in the Deep Dark Woods. Will Mummy bunny find them in time for tea? Read the Story to find out and see.

Learn whilst having fun

Our books are targeted towards helping children develop skills whilst having fun.

Free Book Dedication

Personal dedication ability for every book.

Every book sold supports our Charities

Celebrating 25 years of Jack and Jill Empowering 400 families across Ireland to care for children at home by providing in-home nursing care, respite support and end-of-life care.

1.5% of every sale will be donated to Great Ormond Street Hospital Children’s Charity via Work for Good.

To save the lives of dogs on the ”put to sleep” lists in pounds, to help rehabilitate and rehome them, and to promote responsible dog ownership.
